ACT
209
Delivery and storage of documents on the declaration of will
The record of the declaration of the will with a copy of the written will, a copy of the document on the oral will, i.e. a copy of the record of the hearing of witnesses of the oral will, will be submitted to the probate court, and the court that declared the will will keep their original.
The original written will, documents about the oral will, the record of hearing witnesses of the oral will, as well as the record of the content of the missing or destroyed written will will be kept in the court separately from other files, and their copy or transcript will be attached to the probate file .
